title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9607.1 - Statement of purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9607.1 - Statement of purpose

State Regulations

These rules governing public access to certain records of the

New York City School Construction Authority (the authority) are promulgated for
the purpose of implementing the provisions of section 87(b) of article 6 of the

Public Officers Law (which article is known as the Freedom of Information

Law). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9607.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
